alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 3:19AM CST until December 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation with a glaze of ice expected to coat all outdoor surfaces. Total ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch are possible.. * WHERE...Jewell, Rooks, Osborne and Mitchell Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as freezing drizzle late tonight transitioning to a wintry mix including freezing rain during the early morning hours Thursday...before changing to rain or light drizzle by mid to late afternoon on the backside of this system.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
